name: Unknown Connection
description:
This game was made in 3 days for "Make A Game, The Game Jam" the theme is "Connected"

A quick interactive fiction scenario, you work at a space observation center. Your job is to keep communications with Juan, who's up orbiting in space station 'Zeen'.

Controls

WASD - Walk

Mouse - Look

E - Interact

Credits

Renderbydavid - Game Design, Code, Modeling, Rigging, Animation

Junior Amaris - Modeling

Arsy Project - Music

SleepyUFO - Vent SFX

Morgan Von Brylan - Voice
